ARABIC: قَالَ لِلْمَلَإِ حَوْلَهُۥٓ إِنَّ هَٰذَا لَسَٰحِرٌ عَلِيمٌ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: He said to the High Council round about him, This certainly is a skilled magician
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: The Pharaoh said to the chiefs around him: "He is certainly a clever magician.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: Pharaoh said to the nobles around him: "Surely this man is a skilled magician
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: The Pharaoh said to the people around him, "He is certainly a skillful magician.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: Said Firaun to the court members around him, “He is indeed an expert magician.”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: He said to the chiefs around him: "Verily, this is indeed a well-versed sorcerer."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: (Firon) said to the chiefs around him: Most surely this is a skillful magician,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: Said he to the Council about him, 'Surely this man is a cunning sorcerer
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: (Pharaoh) said unto the chiefs about him: Lo! this is verily a knowing wizard,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: Pharaoh said to the chiefs around him, "Surely this man is a skilful sorcerer.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: Fir'awn said unto the chiefs around him: verily this is a magician knowing.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: He said to the elite [who stood] around him, ‘This is indeed an expert magician
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: (Pharaoh) said to the Chiefs around him: "This is indeed a sorcerer well-versed:
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: [Fir'aun (Pharaoh)] said to the chiefs around him: "Verily! This is indeed a well-versed sorcerer.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: This', said he (Pharaoh) to his Council, 'is a cunning sorcerer
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: He said to the dignitaries around him, “This is a skilled magician.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: [Pharaoh] said to the eminent ones around him, "Indeed, this is a learned magician.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [26:34] He, Pharaoh, said to the council around him, ‘Surely this man is a cunning sorcerer, an expert in the art of magic,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: ((Pharaoh) said unto the chiefs about him: Lo, this) messenger (is verily a knowing wizard) who is very skilful in magic,
